title: Web Development Practice Competency Enhancement: Multimedia-Based Alphabet Reading and Writing for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify 26 uppercase and lowercase letters with accurate pronunciation at 90% accuracy
Learners can write each alphabet letter in standard cursive at 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can read and write simple English words (3-5 letters) according to alphabet combination rules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
